types:type.name: CurrentWeatherDataResponse
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type CurrentWeatherDataResponse = {| coord: {| lon: Number {"typeId": "double"}, lat: Number {"typeId": "double"} |}, weather: Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, main: String, description: String, icon: String |}>, base: String, main: {| temp: Number {"typeId": "double"}, feels_like: Number {"typeId": "double"}, temp_min: Number {"typeId": "double"}, temp_max: Number {"typeId": "double"}, pressure: Number {"typeId": "int"}, humidity: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}, visibility: Number {"typeId": "int"}, wind: {| speed: Number {"typeId": "double"}, deg: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}, clouds: {| all: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}, dt: Number {"typeId": "int"}, sys: {| "type": Number {"typeId": "int"}, id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, country: String, sunrise: Number {"typeId": "int"}, sunset: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}, timezone: Number {"typeId": "int"}, id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, cod: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"coord\\\":{\\\"lon\\\":144.94,\\\"lat\\\":-37.81},\\\"weather\\\":[{\\\"id\\\":804,\\\"main\\\":\\\"Clouds\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"overcast clouds\\\",\\\"icon\\\":\\\"04d\\\"}],\\\"base\\\":\\\"stations\\\",\\\"main\\\":{\\\"temp\\\":285.48,\\\"feels_like\\\":277.04,\\\"temp_min\\\":283.15,\\\"temp_max\\\":283.15,\\\"pressure\\\":1018,\\\"humidity\\\":66},\\\"visibility\\\":10000,\\\"wind\\\":{\\\"speed\\\":10.8,\\\"deg\\\":10},\\\"clouds\\\":{\\\"all\\\":100},\\\"dt\\\":1595037603,\\\"sys\\\":{\\\"type\\\":1,\\\"id\\\":9548,\\\"country\\\":\\\"AU\\\",\\\"sunrise\\\":1595021456,\\\"sunset\\\":1595056895},\\\"timezone\\\":36000,\\\"id\\\":7839805,\\\"name\\\":\\\"Melbourne\\\",\\\"cod\\\":200}"}
